about_the_game:
TL;DR

So, you don’t care about a lot of text? We are still fine with that.
You get the GOLDEN PAW mouse cursor, the GOLDEN MOUSE mouse cursor and a GOLDEN WALLPAPER for your amazing support 💖.
NOTHING more, NOTHING less.

GOLDEN PAW SUPPORTER


We put a lot of work into Pussy Puzzle over the time and felt like its still not enough to make a payed DLC, but wanted to give people the choice to give us some extra money for the small updates and new free pussys here and there 💸💖.

what’s included 🐱👍


  • the GOLDEN PAW logo ingame 🐾
  • the GOLDEN PAW mouse cursor 🐾
  • the GOLDEN MOUSE mouse cursor 🐁
  • a GOLDEN WALLPAPER 🖼️

what’s NOT included 👎🐱

Anything else that is not explicitly listed as included is not included.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i3 / AMD A6-9500
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 / AMD Radeon R5
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Recommended
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 / Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1050 / AMD Radeon VEGA or similar
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Recommended

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Catalina 10.15
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 / AMD Radeon R5
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Recommended
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Catalina 10.15
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1050 or similar
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Recommended
